thing-type.label: ZEN23 Toggle Switch v1
thing-type.description: Toggle Switch v1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtOptimal Wireless Control</p&gt <p&gtMonitor and command your lights remotely using your mobile device — turn your basement lights off while you’re lying in bed.</p&gt <p&gtDirect 3-Way Solution</p&gt <p&gtWire this Z-Wave switch with your existing 3-way switch. Now you only need one smart switch to monitor and control lights from 2 locations!</p&gt <p&gtAdvanced Automation</p&gt <p&gtAssociate with other Z-Wave devices for lighting scenes and events designed around your life.</p&gt <p&gtStronger Connection</p&gt <p&gtA toggle that doubles as a signal repeater to give you a faster and more reliable Z-Wave network overall.</p&gt <p&gtWide Compatibility</p&gt <p&gtConnect this Z-Wave toggle with dozens of smart home systems and brands. Pair it with LED, CFL, and incandescent bulbs.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtBring your Z-Wave gateway hub or controller as close to the switch as possible</li&gt <li&gtPut your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode</li&gt <li&gtToggle the switch UP 3 times very quickly to finalize the inclusion process</li&gt <li&gtA new on/off device will appear on your controller's device list</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtBring your Z-Wave gateway hub or controller as close to the switch as possible</li&gt <li&gtPut your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode</li&gt <li&gtToggle the switch DOWN 3 times very quickly to complete the exclusion process</li&gt <li&gtThe device will disappear from your controller's device list</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtToggle the switch up or down once</p&gt

parameter.label: 1: Toggle Control
parameter.description: Determines whether up is on and down is off; or up is off, down is on<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtToggle Control</p&gt <p&gtParameter 1: Choose if you want the to turn the light on by clicking the toggle up or down</p&gt <p&gtValues: 0 – Toggle up turns the light on, toggle down turns the light off (default);</p&gt <p&gt1 – Toggle up turns the light off, toggle down turns the light on</p&gt <p&gtSize: 1 byte dec.</p&gt</p&gt
